abusenius - (11:35): hi  
sdumitriu - (11:36): Hi  
abusenius - (11:36): do you know where web/standard/\*/templates/attributes\*.vm are used?  
abusenius - (11:36): they seem to be in 1.0 syntax  
sdumitriu - (11:37): I don't think it's used at the moment  
abusenius - (11:38): and in case of attributes.vm, $xwiki.parseMessage("viewattributestitle"), this translation is not there any more  
abusenius - (11:38): how about removing them? :)  
sdumitriu - (11:38): +1  
sdumitriu - (11:38): It was supposed to be what's in information\* at the moment  
abusenius - (11:38): I see, should I write to the mailinglist?  
sdumitriu - (11:38): Yes  
abusenius - (11:38): ok  
sdumitriu - (11:39): You can send a reply to my mail about removing actions and templates

sdumitriu - (12:08): abusenius: $xwiki.getUserName(String) and getUserName(String, true) should not be escaped, since the escaping is done internally (badly, should be fixed)  
sdumitriu - (12:09): Only $xwiki.getUserName(String, false) needs to be escaped  
sdumitriu - (12:09): (in re XWIKI-5191)  
abusenius - (12:11): yea, I've allready noticed... have I still managed to screw it up?
